body:
These women's hips are so wide, they're even wider than the men's hips.
also, I don't blame them, but the Koreans are coming up with some pretty trite plots.  The art is sophisticated, but since the artists are young - I assume - they don't have anything to say about life, so they can't write a frickin decent plot.  Plus, they're under pressure to pump it out.  They need to work with some decent writers, but convince an artist to do someone else's idea.  sheesh

that main character is so dense.  He walks in his brother fcking, and instead of getting out of there as fast as possible, he stays.  He's mad because he thinks his brother should just drop everything and go have a drink with him.

Fun fact what Go Min Do is actualy Like a Lose heroine But think she is main Are make me confused
This manhua have
Dedere,Kuderee,Yanderre heroine
 yeah someting like that
